front.title: Unique Channel Bindings for IPsec Using IKEv2

abstract.t: This document specifies the unique channel bindings for IPsecchannels constructed by connection latching, where the peers used theInternet Key Exchange protocol version 2 (IKEv2). New IKEv2notification payloads are used to select an IKE_SA from which toderive the unique channel bindings for a given IPsec channel.
